Table of Contents

Struct Colour4

Namespace
osu.Framework.Graphics
Assembly
osu.Framework.dll

Represents an RGBA colour in the linear colour space, having colour components in the range 0-1. Stored internally as a Vector4 for performance.

public readonly struct Colour4 : IEquatable<Colour4>
Implements
IEquatable<Colour4>
Inherited Members
object.Equals(object, object)
object.GetType()
object.ReferenceEquals(object, object)
Extension Methods
ExtensionMethods.GetDescription(object)
ExtensionMethods.GetLocalisableDescription<T>(T)
EnumerableExtensions.Yield<T>(T)
ObjectExtensions.AsNonNull<T>(T?)
ObjectExtensions.IsNotNull<T>(T)
ObjectExtensions.IsNull<T>(T)
ContainerExtensions.WithChild<TContainer, TChild>(TContainer, TChild)
ContainerExtensions.WithChildren<TContainer, TChild>(TContainer, IEnumerable<TChild>)
ContainerExtensions.Wrap<TContainer, TChild>(TContainer, TChild)

Constructors

Colour4(byte, byte, byte, byte)

Creates a new Colour4 with the specified RGBA components in the 0-255 range.

public Colour4(byte r, byte g, byte b, byte a)

Parameters

r byte

The red component, in the 0-255 range.

g byte

The green component, in the 0-255 range.

b byte

The blue component, in the 0-255 range.

a byte

The alpha component, in the 0-255 range.

Colour4(Vector4)

Creates a new Colour4 with the specified Vector4, where XYZW maps to RGBA.

public Colour4(Vector4 vector)

Parameters

vector Vector4

The source vector, whose components should be in the 0-1 range.

Colour4(float, float, float, float)

Creates a new Colour4 with the specified RGBA components in the 0-1 range.

public Colour4(float r, float g, float b, float a)

Parameters

r float

The red component, in the 0-1 range.

g float

The green component, in the 0-1 range.

b float

The blue component, in the 0-1 range.

a float

The alpha component, in the 0-1 range.

Fields

Vector

Vector4 representation of the colour, where XYZW maps to RGBA, and each component is in the 0-1 range.

public readonly Vector4 Vector

Field Value

Vector4

Properties

A

Represents the alpha component of the RGBA colour in the 0-1 range.

public float A { get; }

FromHSL(float, float, float, float)

Converts an HSL colour to a Colour4. All components should be in the range 0-1.

public static Colour4 FromHSL(float hue, float saturation, float lightness, float alpha = 1)

Parameters

hue float

The hue, between 0 and 1.

saturation float

The saturation, between 0 and 1.

lightness float

The value, between 0 and 1.

alpha float

The alpha, between 0 and 1.

Returns

Colour4

Converts an HSV colour to a Colour4. All components should be in the range 0-1.

The hue, between 0 and 1.

The value, between 0 and 1.

The alpha, between 0 and 1.

Colour4

FromHex(string)

Converts an RGB or RGBA-formatted hex colour code into a Colour4. Supported colour code formats:

  • RGB
  • #RGB
  • RGBA
  • #RGBA
  • RRGGBB
  • #RRGGBB
  • RRGGBBAA
  • #RRGGBBAA
public static Colour4 FromHex(string hex)

Parameters

hex string

The hex code.

Returns

Colour4

The Colour4 representing the colour.

Exceptions

ArgumentException

If hex is not a supported colour code.

Returns a new Colour4 with the same RGB components, but multiplying the current alpha component by a scalar value. The final alpha is clamped to the 0-1 range.

Parameters

Returns a new Colour4 with the same RGB components and a specified alpha value. The final alpha is clamped to the 0-1 range.

public Colour4 Opacity(byte alpha)

Parameters

alpha byte

The new alpha value for the returned colour, in the 0-255 range.

ToARGB()

Returns the Colour4 as a 32-bit unsigned integer in the format ARGB.

public uint ToARGB()

Returns

uint

ToHSL()

Converts a Colour4 to the HSL colour space, represented in the XYZ components of a Vector4. The returned vector's W component represents the alpha channel of the colour. The angular hue is compressed to the 0-1 range in line with the other components.

public Vector4 ToHSL()

Returns

Vector4

A Vector4 representing the colour, where all four components are in the 0-1 range.

ToHSV()

Converts a Colour4 to the HSV colour space, represented in the XYZ components of a Vector4. The returned vector's W component represents the alpha channel of the colour. The angular hue is compressed to the 0-1 range in line with the other components.

public Vector4 ToHSV()

Returns

Vector4

A Vector4 representing the colour, where all four components are in the 0-1 range.

ToHex(bool)

Converts a Colour4 into a hex colour code.

public string ToHex(bool alwaysOutputAlpha = false)

Parameters

alwaysOutputAlpha bool

Whether the alpha channel should always be output. If false, the alpha channel is only output if this colour is translucent.

Returns

string

The hex code representing the colour.

ToLinear()

Returns a new Colour4 with an SRGB->Linear conversion applied to each of its chromatic components. Alpha is unchanged.

public Colour4 ToLinear()

Returns

Colour4

Returns the Colour4 as a 32-bit unsigned integer in the format RGBA.

public uint ToRGBA()

ToSRGB()

Returns a new Colour4 with a Linear->SRGB conversion applied to each of its chromatic components. Alpha is unchanged.

public Colour4 ToSRGB()

TryParseHex(string, out Colour4)

Attempts to convert an RGB or RGBA-formatted hex colour code into a Colour4. Supported colour code formats:

  • RGB
  • #RGB
  • RGBA
  • #RGBA
  • RRGGBB
  • #RRGGBB
  • RRGGBBAA
  • #RRGGBBAA
public static bool TryParseHex(string hex, out Colour4 colour)

Parameters

hex string

The hex code.

colour Colour4

The Colour4 representing the colour, if parsing succeeded.

Returns

bool

Whether the input could be parsed as a hex code.

operator +(Colour4, Colour4)

Adds two colours in the linear colour space. The final value is clamped to the 0-1 range.

public static Colour4 operator +(Colour4 first, Colour4 second)

Parameters

first Colour4

The left hand side of the addition.

second Colour4

The right hand side of the addition.

Returns

operator /(Colour4, float)

Linearly divides a colour by a scalar value. The final value is clamped to the 0-1 range.

public static Colour4 operator /(Colour4 colour, float scalar)

Parameters

colour Colour4

The original colour.

scalar float

The scalar value to divide by. Must be positive.

Returns

Colour4

Exceptions

ArgumentOutOfRangeException

Thrown if scalar is zero or negative.
